Short, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Opening with ties at the front, gathers at the shoulders and a seam at the waist with decorative lacing at the sides. Straight skirt with a rounded hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Two chest pockets with a button, yoke with a hanger loop at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted lace top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a semi-transparent yoke and sleeves. Partly lined in jersey.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a wool blend with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button and a loose yoke at the back and partly at the front with a button. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, a tab and buckle at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with lace in a straight cut with pin-tucks at the top, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with lace and embroidery at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with lace and embroidery at the hem. Jersey underdress.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and gently tapered legs with decorative beads down the sides.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with animal print motifs, an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
